Summary: saw a red bleep as moving turned silver then a lg.golden orb appeared behind trees. then it was just gone
divs: Sighting DetailsI was wake looked out my back window and saw a red flash,fairly small but really traveled fast as it moved it turned silver and dissapeared. I wasn't sleeping so I went back, then I saw a very large Golden light behind trees. It was huge. It stayed for about 1 hr then it was gone.I really wasn't upset just curious. My cats were awake but OK.The golden orb it you want to call it that. it was as if it was waiting on something,that was the feeling I got.
